name: MAKE-IT: Puzzle Game
description:
[CONTROLS] MOUSE AND CLICK - INTERACT W A S D - MOVE R - RESET Q - QUIT AND GO TO MENU N - DEBUG (FULLSCREEN ONLY) [DEVELOPMENT]

El proyecto esta en desarrollo no esta completo y puede haber bugs, reportalos!

[BUGS]
  • The game uses .OGG audio format it may not be supported on Safari 15 or lower versions
